newsitem.title: CHINA: China '96 private business tax at 44.845 bln yuan.
newsitem.headline: China '96 private business tax at 44.845 bln yuan.

text.p: China's tax collection from private business in 1996 reached 44.845 billion yuan ($5.4 billion), China Business Daily said on Thursday.
It gave no comparative figure for 1995.
However, it said that last year's figure compared with just 4.962 billion yuan in 1986.
The 1996 total accounted for seven percent of China's total collection of commercial and industrial taxes for the year, compared with 3.88 percent in 1986, it said.
